text:
The studie was about effects of the music on neurodegenerative illness.
It has been proved that playing music could change cerebral structure and cerebral functions. Music also impact cerebral regions involved in high level cognitives schedules such as attention or memory.
Previous studies had already proved the impact on children brain. Indeed with RMI we found that some musicians cerebral parts  were highly extend in comparaison of a non musician.
But there is a new interest in this studie. Indeed, the music could help to prevent neurodegeneratives pathologies like Alzheimer. This practice won't avoid the apparition of the disease but it could help to retard the symptoms. Music also seems to be very interesting for patient in a critical state of the disease. In fact, most of the time music is the only way for them to communicate. Observations of sing or music classroom has shown an high cognitive wake up for the patients. During these sessions we noticed as well a decreased in their comportemental troubles. To finish, with the help of the music we found that it was possible for Alzheimer patients to learn new things inconsciously with repetitions of tasks.
 I think this studie shows an alternative way in the treatment of neurodegenerative diseases. It's interesant because it's a low cost possibility to help those people. It is also a way to stimulate them and help them to enjoy therselve. An important point is the fact that there are absolutely no side effects.
